oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Attack on York Town
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Campaigns & battles; Battlefields
United States--History--Revolution, 1775-1783--American forces; Yorktown (Va.); Yorktown Common (Yorktown, Va.); Yorktown (Va.)--History
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: J. H. Nesmith
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Battle at Yorktown was the definitive battle of the American Revolution. On October 19, 1781, combined American and French forces defeated British troops commanded by General Charles Cornwallis. Cornwallis's surrender to General George Washington effectively ended the War.
